messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: How about...
messages.msgSnippet: And I m *still* not up to owning an RPG. :-D  My deeply felt thanks to MissB for undertaking the monster and putting us on the road to having a game of our
messages.messageBody:
And I'm *still* not up to owning an RPG. :-D My deeply felt thanks to MissB for undertaking the monster and putting us on the road to having a game of our own. (And I do think it was a good idea that we held off for a while and got to know more about each other, the guys, and the times... I'm looking forward to interacting with you guys... especially my big brother, Itou.)

phil (Suzuki Miki.. <hiccup>)


"GBattista (hajimenokizu)" <wounds@...> wrote:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@y...>
wrote:
> Not a good idea to mix the RPG with other things. And, heavens,
I'm certainly not suggesting we do anything now. Once the dust
settles and we've all rested from this first frenzy of activity, then
maybe we could suggest it to this group --- there may be a member
then who'd love to set it up. I'm not sure I'm up to owning an RPG.
>
> I'm mostly just goofing off with MissB... uh... I mean 'Jime. :-)
>
> pachi (getting more & more comfortable in this new uniform...)
>
> Shimazu Masayoshi <patriot014@h...> wrote:
> > Geez, an RPG made up of the members in miburo would be fun...
>
> So does this mean we're actually going to do it? Let's not overexert
> ourselves. Maybe we can have an RPG as part of the Fiction group
that
> we're forming.
>

Per Phil who strongly encouraged me to read prior post... I saw this
one... Since we're doing an RPG... Well back in the day when the
shole SHQ was still in it's infancy stage Masayoshi and Phil
discussed this (see above)... Kind of funny when I think about it...

~wounds
> --Yoshi (Kondou? Shimazu? Who knows?)

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: How about...
messages.msgSnippet: Not a good idea to mix the RPG with other things.  And, heavens, I m certainly not suggesting we do anything now.  Once the dust settles and we ve all rested
messages.messageBody:
Not a good idea to mix the RPG with other things. And, heavens, I'm certainly not suggesting we do anything now. Once the dust settles and we've all rested from this first frenzy of activity, then maybe we could suggest it to this group --- there may be a member then who'd love to set it up. I'm not sure I'm up to owning an RPG.

I'm mostly just goofing off with MissB... uh... I mean 'Jime. :-)

pachi (getting more & more comfortable in this new uniform...)

Shimazu Masayoshi <patriot014@...> wrote:
> Geez, an RPG made up of the members in miburo would be fun...

So does this mean we're actually going to do it? Let's not overexert
ourselves. Maybe we can have an RPG as part of the Fiction group that
we're forming.

--Yoshi (Kondou? Shimazu? Who knows?)

Ah, but HERE, no one dies or gets beheaded! Mwahahahhaaaa! Okita,

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: How about...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/17/2004 12:57:30 PM Eastern Standard Time, spiritus_saitou@*... writes: Well, I know better than to ask which you prefer to be called
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/17/2004 12:57:30 PM Eastern Standard Time,
spiritus_saitou@... writes:
Well, I know better than to ask which you prefer to be called by. Can I call
you 'Jime? (Jon should be made a moderator and we can give him Souji, ne?)

Geez, an RPG made up of the members in miburo would be fun...

pachi
First, I agree about the RPG. Second, sure I'll be 'Jime. But do I have to
call people "Ahou"? Or can I be bored Saito?

'Jime, was MissBehavin

messages.messageBody:
Well, I know better than to ask which you prefer to be called by. Can I call you 'Jime? (Jon should be made a moderator and we can give him Souji, ne?)

Geez, an RPG made up of the members in miburo would be fun...

pachi

Warg3791@... wrote:
In a message dated 3/17/2004 12:31:14 PM Eastern Standard Time,
spiritus_saitou@... writes:
I'll be working on it today. I'll invite you guys personally. And I'll name
it SHQ Spy Division. Hey, fellow squad captain... whatever your name is...
you willing to help moderate the information coming in from spies and keep them
from wreaking havoc?

pachi (beginning to think I'm in an RPG)
Sure. Why not? (I suppose you're talking to me...)

-Okita/Saito , formerly MissBehavin (suffering multiple personalities.)

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] How about...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/17/2004 12:16:26 PM Eastern Standard Time, spiritus_saitou@*... writes: I name the fiction list SHQ Spy Division ?  I m flirting
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/17/2004 12:16:26 PM Eastern Standard Time,
spiritus_saitou@... writes:
I name the fiction list "SHQ Spy Division"? I'm flirting with the
spy theme because we're telling stories... sometimes stories
characters probably wouldn't want told. I think that Yahoogroups
searches the group description, so having Saitou's name in there
would still pull it up on a search by his name...

pachi
Sounds good to me.

M.B.
